content:
Sutton's Inc. prides itself on being a full-service remodeler with a longstanding history and an experienced, dedicated team. By offering warranty support, emergency support, and a comprehensive suite of services, we differentiate ourselves from other remodelers who may focus solely on lower prices. Our commitment to quality and value is reflected in our choice of professional-grade products: ProVia, Royal Building Products, and GAF.

ProVia:
ProVia is known for producing high-quality, custom-made doors and windows. What sets ProVia apart from competitors is their dedication to craftsmanship, durability, and energy efficiency. Their products are designed to meet or exceed ENERGY STAR standards, ensuring that homeowners can enjoy reduced energy consumption and lower utility bills. Additionally, ProVia windows and doors are built with attention to detail, providing exceptional aesthetics and long-lasting performance. Their commitment to excellence is backed by industry-leading warranties, giving customers peace of mind in their investment.

Royal Building Products:
As a leading manufacturer of vinyl siding, Royal Building Products offers a wide range of options in terms of style, color, and design to suit various architectural preferences. Their siding products are designed to withstand harsh weather conditions and resist fading, warping, and cracking, ensuring homeowners have a low-maintenance, visually appealing exterior. The company's commitment to sustainability is reflected in their products, which are made from recyclable materials and contribute to better energy efficiency. The combination of durability, aesthetic appeal, and eco-friendliness makes Royal Building Products' vinyl siding a superior choice compared to other siding options on the market.

GAF:
GAF is North America's largest roofing manufacturer, known for their premium roofing systems. GAF's products are designed with Advanced Protection Shingle Technology, which ensures durability, wind resistance, and long-term performance. Their shingles are made with proprietary granules that provide excellent UV protection and color retention, preserving the roof's appearance and effectiveness. GAF also offers industry-leading warranties, including the Golden Pledge Limited Warranty, which covers both material defects and workmanship for up to 50 years. This commitment to quality and reliability sets GAF apart from other roofing manufacturers.

By choosing to work with these professional-class brands, Sutton's Inc. ensures that customers receive the highest quality products and services, creating a strong value proposition in the market. Our focus on value, quality, and full-service support allows us to stand out among competitors and attract discerning homeowners who prioritize long-term performance and aesthetic appeal.
